name: @loopback/openapi-spec-builder
description: Make it easy to create OpenAPI (Swagger) specification documents in your tests using the builder pattern.

scripts.build: npm run build:dist && npm run build:dist6
scripts.clean: lb-clean loopback-openapi-spec*.tgz dist dist6 package api-docs
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run build:apidocs
scripts.verify: npm pack && tar xf loopback-openapi-spec*.tgz && tree package && npm run clean

author: IBM
